name: Lord Of The Skies (itch)
description:
Take the war back to the aliens... 

After an invasion on earth, our Hero has set out to destroy every alien planet that took part in the destruction of earth.

CONTROLS

Use The Mouse To Move The Space Fighter

Use The Left Mouse Button (LMB) To Shoot at Enemy Planets.

Use The Right Mouse Button (RMB) To Boost.

Use WASD To Spin and Dodge Incoming Bullets

HOW TO PLAY

Destroy all the Turrets on the Planet To Disable its Shield, then Shoot the Planet to Destroy it.

OBJECTIVES

Destroy as Many Alien Planets as Possible and Try to Retrieve the Stolen Material From Earth Which they Transported To Their Planets.
